price: To, wanda ya tuba a bãyan zãluncinsa, kuma ya gyãra (halinsa), to, lalle ne Allah Yanã karɓar tubarsa. Lalle Allah Mai gãfara ne, Mai jin ƙai.
arabic: فَمَن تَابَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ظُلۡمِهِۦ وَأَصۡلَحَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَتُوبُ عَلَيۡهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٌ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: faman tāba min baʿdi ẓul'mihi wa-aṣlaḥa fa-inna al-laha yatūbu ʿalayhi inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
